title: Colonial Period
short_definition: The era of Spanish colonial rule in the Americas (1492-1825).

title: Encomienda
short_definition: Labor system in colonial Spanish America granting colonists indigenous labor.

title: Viceroyalty
short_definition: Administrative division of the Spanish Empire governed by a viceroy.

title: Muisca
short_definition: Indigenous people who inhabited the Bogot치 savannah before Spanish colonization.

title: Resguardo
short_definition: Indigenous reservation established during Spanish colonial rule.

title: Reducci칩n
short_definition: The Spanish colonial policy of concentrating indigenous peoples into grid-like villages.
